clinical_study.brief_title: The Role of Genetic Factors in the Development of Idiopathic Scoliosis in the Kazakh Population

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to identify genetic determinants of susceptibility to idiopathic scoliosis . It will assist in predicting individual risks of disease progression and would help to clarify pathophysiologic mechanisms of idiopathic scoliosis

primary_outcome.measure: Genotyping for the SNP associated with liver cirrhosis
primary_outcome.description: Genotype frequency of SNP in the study genes of participants and control participants.

intervention.description: SNP analysis of the DNA obtained from peripheral blood sample
